mapper.sql: SELECT "ov".SVC_CODE, concat( "os".SYS_CODE, concat( '-', "os".SYS_NAME )) AS SYS_NAME, "osv".SV_SCN_ID, "osv".SV_ID, "osv".SV_NO, "osv".SV_TYPE, "osv".SV_CODE, "osv".SV_NAME, "ov".SVC_NAME, "osv".SCN_DES, "osv".SV_INTERFACE, "osv".SCN_SYS_ID, "osv".RESPONSE_FLAG, "osv".TIME_OUT, "osv".HEAD_CODE, "osv".UPDATE_REASON, "osv".UPDATE_CONTENT, "osv".SERVICE_ID, "osv".SV_SV_ID, "osv".PROJECT_CODE, "osv".APPLICATION_ID, "osv".SV_GRP_ID, "osv".XML_VALID_FLAG, "osv".STD_FIELD_CHECK, "osv".JK_ADAP_FLAG, "osv".JK_ADAP_TYPE, "osv".LOCK_TYPE, "osv".AUDIT_STATE, "osv".SV_STATUS, "osv".SV_CREATE_TIME, "osv".SV_CREATE_USER, "osv".SV_UPDATE_TIME, "osv".SV_UPDATE_USER, "osv".JK_VERSION_ID, "osv".SERVICE_VERSION_ID, "osv".APP_GLOBETRADECODE, "osv".MULTI_VERSION, "osv".SV_MESSAGE_FORMAT, "osv".SV_COMMUNICATION_PROTOCOL, "osv".SV_HTTP_URL, "osv".SV_EXTERNAL_INTERFACE_CODE, "osv".BYPASS_OUTPUT_SYS, "osv".INSTANCE_ID, "osv".PROCESS_KEY, "osv".APPLY_USER_ID, "osv".APPLY_USER_NAME, "osv".APPLY_TIME, "osv".SV_INTEGRATION_MODE FROM opr_scenario_version "osv" LEFT JOIN opr_system "os" ON "osv".SCN_SYS_ID = "os".SYS_ID LEFT JOIN opr_service "ov" ON "ov".SVC_ID = "osv".SERVICE_ID
mapper.delete:
delete from opr_scenario_version where SV_ID in
#{svId}
mapper.select: SELECT "os".SYS_NAME AS "sysName", "osv".SV_SCN_ID AS "svScnId", "osv".SV_ID AS "svId", "osv".SV_NO AS "svNo", "osv".SV_TYPE AS "svType", "osv".SV_CODE AS "svCode", "osv".SV_NAME AS "svName", "osv".SCN_DES AS "scnDes", "osv".SV_INTERFACE AS "svInterface", "osv".SCN_SYS_ID AS "scnSysId", "osv".RESPONSE_FLAG AS "responseFlag", "osv".TIME_OUT AS "timeOut", "osv".HEAD_CODE AS "headCode", "osv".UPDATE_REASON AS "updateReason", "osv".SERVICE_ID AS "serviceId", "osv".SV_SV_ID AS "svSvId", "osv".PROJECT_CODE AS "projectCode", "osv".APPLICATION_ID AS "applicationId", "osv".SV_GRP_ID AS "svGrpId", "osv".XML_VALID_FLAG AS "xmlValidFlag", "osv".STD_FIELD_CHECK AS "stdFieldCheck", "osv".JK_ADAP_FLAG AS "jkAdapFlag", "osv".JK_ADAP_TYPE AS "jkAdapType", "osv".LOCK_TYPE AS "lockType", "osv".AUDIT_STATE AS "auditState", "osv".SV_STATUS AS "svStatus", "osv".SV_CREATE_TIME AS "svCreateTime", "osv".SV_CREATE_USER AS "svCreateUser", "osv".SV_UPDATE_TIME AS "svUpdateTime", "osv".SV_UPDATE_USER AS "svUpdateUser", "osv".JK_VERSION_ID AS "jkVersionId", "osv".APP_GLOBETRADECODE AS "appGlobetradecode", "osv".MULTI_VERSION AS "mutiVersion", "osv".SV_MESSAGE_FORMAT AS "svMessageFormat", "osv".SV_COMMUNICATION_PROTOCOL AS "svCommunicationProtocol", "osv".SV_HTTP_URL AS "svHttpUrl", "osv".SV_EXTERNAL_INTERFACE_CODE AS "svExternalInterfaceCode", "osv".BYPASS_OUTPUT_SYS AS "bypassOutputSys", "osv".SV_INTEGRATION_MODE AS "svIntegrationMode", "osv".SV_DATA_SOURCE AS "svDataSource", "osv".INSTANCE_ID AS "instanceId", "osv".PROCESS_KEY AS "processKey", "osv".APPLY_USER_ID AS "applyUserId", "osv".APPLY_USER_NAME AS "applyUserName", "osv".APPLY_TIME AS "applyTime", "osv".UPDATE_CONTENT AS "updateContent" FROM opr_scenario_version "osv" LEFT JOIN opr_system "os" ON "osv".SCN_SYS_ID = "os".SYS_ID WHERE "osv".SV_ID = #{svId}

SELECT SCENE_WINDOW_TIME AS "sceneWindowTime", SCENE_TIMEOUT AS "sceneTimeout", ONE_TIME_USER_NUM AS "oneTimeUserNum", ONLINE_DATE AS "onlineDate", OFFLINE_DATE AS "offlineDate", SCENE_PRIORITY AS "scenePriority", TRADE_PER_SECOND AS "tradePerSecond" FROM opr_scenario_version_param WHERE SCENE_VERSION_ID = #{ sceneVersionId}

SELECT RESOURCE_TYPE AS "resourceType", RESOURCE_NAME AS "resourceName", RESOURCE_SIZE AS "resourceSize", RESOURCE_URL AS "resourceUrl", RESOURCE_DESC AS "resourceDesc", CRT_TIME AS "crtTime" FROM aesb_g_scene_resource WHERE SCENE_VERSION_ID = #{svId}

SELECT "t".SYS_CODE AS "sysCode", "t".SYS_NAME AS "sysName", "t".SYS_DES AS "sysDes", "u".user_name as "userName", "d".dept_name as "deptName" FROM opr_scenario_version "v" LEFT JOIN opr_system "t" ON "v".SCN_SYS_ID = "t".SYS_ID INNER JOIN sys_user "u" ON "t".MANAGER_ID = "u".user_id INNER JOIN sys_dept "d" ON "u".dept_id = "d".dept_id WHERE "v".SV_ID = #{svId}
SELECT SERVICE_ID AS "serviceId", SV_CODE AS "svCode" FROM opr_scenario_version WHERE SV_ID = #{svId}

SELECT "ov".SVC_CODE, "ov".SVC_NAME, concat(concat("os".SYS_CODE, '-'), "os".SYS_NAME) AS SYS_NAME, "osv".SV_SCN_ID, "osv".SV_ID, "osv".SV_NO, "osv".SV_TYPE, "osv".SV_CODE, "osv".SV_NAME, "osv".SCN_DES, "osv".SV_INTERFACE, "osv".SCN_SYS_ID, "osv".RESPONSE_FLAG, "osv".TIME_OUT, "osv".HEAD_CODE, "osv".UPDATE_REASON, "osv".UPDATE_CONTENT, "osv".SERVICE_ID, "osv".SV_SV_ID, "osv".PROJECT_CODE, "osv".APPLICATION_ID, "osv".SV_GRP_ID, "osv".XML_VALID_FLAG, "osv".STD_FIELD_CHECK, "osv".JK_ADAP_FLAG, "osv".JK_ADAP_TYPE, "osv".LOCK_TYPE, "osv".AUDIT_STATE, "osv".SV_STATUS, "osv".SV_CREATE_TIME, "osv".SV_CREATE_USER, "osv".SV_UPDATE_TIME, "osv".SV_UPDATE_USER, "osv".JK_VERSION_ID, "osv".SERVICE_VERSION_ID, "osv".APP_GLOBETRADECODE, "osv".MULTI_VERSION, "osv".SV_MESSAGE_FORMAT, "osv".SV_COMMUNICATION_PROTOCOL, "osv".SV_HTTP_URL, "osv".SV_EXTERNAL_INTERFACE_CODE, "osv".BYPASS_OUTPUT_SYS, "osv".SV_INTEGRATION_MODE FROM opr_scenario_version "osv" LEFT JOIN opr_system "os" ON "osv".SCN_SYS_ID = "os".SYS_ID LEFT JOIN opr_service "ov" ON "ov".SVC_ID = "osv".SERVICE_ID WHERE "osv".SV_CODE = #{svCode} and "osv".SERVICE_ID = #{serviceId} order by "osv".SV_NO DESC

SELECT ID, CHANGE_TYPE AS "changeType", CRT_TIME AS "crtTime", Blob_To_Varchar(FIELD_CHANGE_NOTE) AS "fieldChangeNote", FIELD_INOUT AS "fieldInout", FIELD_NAME_CN AS "fieldNameCn", FIELD_NAME_EN AS "fieldNameEn", FIELD_POSITION AS "fieldPosition", RECORD_TYPE AS "recordType", SCENE_ID AS "sceneId", SCENE_VERSION_ID AS "sceneVersionId" FROM aesb_g_scene_change_record WHERE SCENE_VERSION_ID = #{ svId}

SELECT "p".PROJECT_CODE AS "projectCode", "m".SYSTEM_ID AS "systemId" FROM aesb_g_project_info "p" LEFT JOIN aesb_g_sys_pro_mapping "m" ON "p".PROJECT_CODE = "m".PROJECT_CODE WHERE "m".PROJECT_CODE = #{ projectCode}
mapper.update:
update opr_scenario_version
SV_SCN_ID = #{svScnId}, SV_NO = #{svNo}, SV_TYPE = #{svType}, SV_CODE = #{svCode}, SV_NAME = #{svName}, SCN_DES = #{scnDes}, SV_INTERFACE = #{svInterface}, SCN_SYS_ID = #{scnSysId}, RESPONSE_FLAG = #{responseFlag}, TIME_OUT = #{timeOut}, HEAD_CODE = #{headCode}, UPDATE_REASON = #{updateReason}, UPDATE_CONTENT = #{updateContent}, SERVICE_ID = #{serviceId}, SV_SV_ID = #{svSvId}, PROJECT_CODE = #{projectCode}, APPLICATION_ID = #{applicationId}, SV_GRP_ID = #{svGrpId}, XML_VALID_FLAG = #{xmlValidFlag}, STD_FIELD_CHECK = #{stdFieldCheck}, JK_ADAP_FLAG = #{jkAdapFlag}, JK_ADAP_TYPE = #{jkAdapType}, LOCK_TYPE = #{lockType}, AUDIT_STATE = #{auditState}, SV_STATUS = #{svStatus}, SV_UPDATE_TIME = #{svUpdateTime}, SV_UPDATE_USER = #{svUpdateUser}, JK_VERSION_ID = #{jkVersionId}, SERVICE_VERSION_ID = #{serviceVersionId},
APP_GLOBETRADECODE = #{appGlobetradecode},
SV_COMMUNICATION_PROTOCOL = #{svCommunicationProtocol},
SV_HTTP_URL = #{svHttpUrl}, SV_MESSAGE_FORMAT = #{svMessageFormat}, SV_EXTERNAL_INTERFACE_CODE = #{svExternalInterfaceCode},
INSTANCE_ID = #{instanceId}, PROCESS_KEY = #{processKey}, APPLY_USER_ID = #{applyUserId}, APPLY_USER_NAME = #{applyUserName}, APPLY_TIME = #{applyTime},
where SV_ID = #{svId}
mapper.select:
SELECT /*SF_ID "sfId", SF_SV_ID "svId", SCN_CODE "scnCode", SF_COUNT "sfCount", SF_EN_NAME "sfEnName", SF_CN_NAME "sfCnName", SF_TYPE "sfType", SF_DATA_TYPE "sfDataType", SF_LENGTH "sfLength", SF_FRACTION "sfFraction", SF_IS_ENSSENTIAL "sfIsEnssential", SF_CYCLE_TIMES "sfCycleTimes", SF_FORMAT "sfFormat", SF_ENUM "sfEnum", SF_DES "sfDes", SF_DEFAULT "sfDefault", SF_IS_SENSITIVE "sfIsSensitive", SF_PATH "sfPath", SF_QUOTE_NAME "sfQuoteName", SF_QUOTE_NAMESPACE "sfQuoteNamespace", SF_QUOTE_FILE_NAME "sfQuoteFileName", SF_QUOTE_FILE_NAME_EN "sfQuoteFileNameEn", SF_QUOTE_FIELD_NAME_EN "sfQuoteFieldNameEn", SF_LENGTH_TYPE "sfLengthType", SF_IS_STD_CHECK "sfIsStdCheck", SF_STD_CODE "sfStdCode", SF_HTTP_PARAM_TYPE "sfHttpParamType", SF_EXAMPLE "sfExample", SF_ENCRYPT_MODE "sfEncryptMode", SF_STD_NAME_CN "sfStdNameCn", SF_DATA_SOURCE "sfDataSource"*/ * FROM OPR_SCENARIO_FIELD
SF_SV_ID = #{svId} and SF_TYPE = #{type}
mapper.insert: insert into OPR_SCENARIO_FIELD ( SF_ID, SF_SV_ID, SCN_CODE, SF_COUNT, SF_EN_NAME, SF_CN_NAME, SF_TYPE, SF_DATA_TYPE, )values ( #{sfId}, #{sfSvId}, #{scnCode}, #{sfCount}, #{sfEnName}, #{sfCnName}, #{sfType}, #{sfDataType}, )
